summary: LOSS OF POWER STEERING WHILE TURNING AND STEERING WHEEL JERKED HARD AS IF TO STRAIGHTEN ITSELF.  THIS OCCURRED DURING DRIVING.  WE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO DEALER AND WAS TOLD THE GM SERVICE BULLETIN 14116 ONLY COVERS STEERING POSITION SENSORS, BUT NOT MOTORS.  BUT ON OTHER COMPARABLE MODELS, IT'S THE MOTOR, NOT SENSORS.  NOW THESE ARE OF THE SAME SYSTEM AND COMPONENTS.  WHY?!
